content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: EnableSiteWAF path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/waf content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum enable waf
reqbody
deliveryenablesitewafrequest
type obj
apiurls
type str
desc a list of api urls which receive different processing through the waf than website requests
required true
responses
title: 26_Site Features_EnableSiteWAF_158.json
